title: Performance Tool W1173 SAE/Metric 40-Piece SAE and Metric Socket Set, 1/4" & 3/8" Drive
description: The Performance Tool W1173 40-Piece Socket Set delivers professional-grade results for any mechanic's needs. This versatile set includes a ratchet, extension bar, 1/4" spinner handle, spark plug socket, adapter, and more, making it capable of handling any job. With a wide range of socket sizes from 5/32" to 3/4" and 4mm to 17mm, this set ensures you always have the right size for the task at hand. The sockets are housed in a sturdy blow-molded case that keeps them organized and easy to transport. Made from high-quality materials, this socket set is designed to last, providing you with long-lasting durability that you can rely on for years to come. Add this set to your toolbox for a versatile and reliable tool that can handle any job.
